src: “Ons het nou 4-maand oue muise wat nie diabeties is, wat eenmaal diabeties was,” het hy bygevoeg.
mt: “We now have 4-month-old mice that are not diabetic, but once were,” he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor van medisyne by Dalhousie Universiteit in Halifax, Nova Scotia en voorsitter van die kliniese en wetenskaplike afdeling van die Kanadese Vereniging vir Diabetes, het gemaan dat die navorsing steeds in sy vroeë stadium is.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chairman of the clinical and scientific department of the Canadian Association for Diabetes, said the research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Soos sommige ander deskundiges is hy skepties of diabetes genees kan word, let op dat hierdie vindings geen verwantskap het met mense wat alreeds Tipe 1 diabetes het nie.
mt: As some other experts, he is skeptical that diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Sara Danius, die Permanente Sekretaris van die Nobel Kommitee vir Literatuur by die Switserse Akedemie, het Maandag ‘n publieke aankondiging gemaak gedurende ‘n radio program op Sveriges Radio in Swede, dat die kommitee nie in staat was om Bob Dylan direk te bereik nie, in verband met die wen van die 2016 Nobel Prys vir Literatuur, en het opgegee in hul pogings om hom te bereik.
mt: Sara Danius, the Permanent Secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, made a public announcement on Monday during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden, that the committee was unable to directly reach Bob Dylan, in connection with the win of the 2016 Nobel Prize for Literature, and gave up on their efforts to reach him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius het gesê: “Op die oomblik doen ons niks. Ek het geskakel en eposse gestuur na sy naaste medewerkers en het baie vriendelike antwoorde ontvang. Vir nou is dit sekerlik genoeg.”
mt: Danius said: “Right now we’re doing nothing. I’ve called and emailed his closest colleagues and received very friendly responses. For now, that’s probably enough.”
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Voorheen, het Ring se CEO, Jamie Siminoff, opgemerk dat die maatskappy begin het toe sy deurklokkie nie hoorbaar was van die werkswinkel in sy motorhuis.
mt: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, noted that the company began when its doorbell was inaudible from the workshop in his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Hy sê hy het ‘n WiFi deurklokkie gebou.
mt: He says he built a WiFi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff het gesê dat verkope die hoogtes ingegaan het na sy 2013 verskyning in die Haaitenk episode waar die vertoning se paneel besluit het om verdere befondsing te staak.
mt: Siminoff said that sales had taken a hit after his 2013 appearance on Shark Tank where the show's panel decided to cut off further funding.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: In laat 2017, het Siminoff op die televisie koopkanaal QVC verskyn.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the television shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring het ook ‘n regsgeding met ‘n meedingende sekuriteitsmaatskappy, die ADT Korporasie, gevestig.
mt: Ring also filed a lawsuit against a competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Tot op hede is daar een toets-inenting wat sterftes aan Ebola verminder, maar tot op hede het geen middels al duidelike gepastheid getoon vir die behandeling van ‘n bestaande infeksie nie.
mt: So far, there is one test vaccine that reduces deaths from Ebola, but so far no treatments have shown clear efficacy for treating an existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Een teenliggaam middel, ZMapp, het aanvanklik vordering in die veld beloof, maar formele studies het getoon dat dit minder voordele inhou as wat verlang word in die voorkoming van sterftes.
mt: One experimental treatment, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies showed it had fewer benefits than hoped in preventing deaths.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: In die PALM verhoor, het ZMapp as beheer gedien, wat beteken dat wetenskaplikes dit gebruik as ‘n basislyn en vergelyk drie ander behandelinge daarmee.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared three other treatments to it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: VSA Gimnastiek ondersteun die Verenigde State Olimpiese Kommittee se brief en aanvaar die absolute behoefte van die Olimpiese familie om 'n veilige omgewing vir al ons atlete te bevorder.
mt: The United States Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Ons stem saam met die USOC se verklaring dat die belange van ons atlete en klubs, en hul sport, kan beter bedien word deur ‘n stap vorentoe met betekenisvolle verandering in ons organisasie, eerder as die ontneming van sertifikate.
mt: We agree with the USOC’s statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, can be better served by moving forward with meaningful changes in our organization, rather than the revocation of our charter.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: VSA Gimnastiek ondersteun ‘n onafhanklike ondersoek wat lig mag werp op die misbruik van die proporsie wat so heldhaftiglik beskryf is deur die oorlewendes van Larry Nassar wat so lank ongemerk gebly het en enige nodige en gepaste veranderinge behels.
mt: U.S. Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shed light on the abuse of the proportion that so heroically described by the survivors of Larry Nassar who so long remained unreported and any necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: VSA Gimnastiek en die USOK het dieselfde doel – om die sport van gimnastiek, onder andere, as veilig moontlik te maak vir atlete om hulle drome te volg in ‘n veilige, positiewe en bemagtige omgewing.
mt: The USAG and the USOC have the same goal – to make the sport of gymnastics, among other things, as safe as possible for athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and supportive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Gedurend die 1960s het Brezinski vir John F. Kennedy gewerk as sy adviseur en toe by die Lyndon B. Johnson administrasie.
mt: 1960s Brezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his adviser and then at the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Tydens die 1976 verkiesings het hy Carter op buitelandse beleid geadviseer, en het toe as Nasionale Sekuriteitsadviseur (NSA) gedien tussen 1977 tot 1981, na Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 elections, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and served as National Security Advisor (NSA) between 1977 to 1981, after Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Hy het as NSA vir Carter diplomaties bygestaan in die hantering van wêreldsake, soos die Kamp Dawid Ooreenkomste, 1978; wat die VSA-Sjina verhoudings genormaliseer het regdeur die laat 1970s; die Irannese Revolusie, wat tot die Irannese gyselaarsdrama gelei het, 1979; en die Sowjet inval van Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: He served as Carter's National Security Advisor in the handling of world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; which normalized U.S.-China relations throughout the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iranian hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Die fliek, waarin Ryan Gosling en Emma Stone voorkom, het ‘n nominasie ontvang in al die grootste kategorië.
mt: The film, in which Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone appear, has received a nomination in all the major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling en Stone het nominasies vir, onderskeidelik, Beste Akteur en Beste Aktrise ontvang.
mt: Gosling and Stone have received nominations for, respectively, Best Actor and Best Actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Die ander nominasies sluit Beste Film, Direkteur, Filmkuns, Kostuum-ontwerp, Film Redigering, Oorspronklike Telling, Produksie Ontwerp, Klank Redigering, Klank Vermenging en Oorspronklike Draaiboek.
mt: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Twee liedere van die film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) en City of Stars, het nominasies gekry vir die beste oorspronklike lied. Lionsgate ateljee het 26 nominasies ontvang - meer as enige ander ateljee.
mt: 2 songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, have been nominated for best original song. Lionsgate studio has received 26 nominations - more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Laat Sondag het die Verenigde State se president Donald Trump in ‘n verklaring wat hy deur middel van die perssekretaris gelewer het, aangekondig dat die VSA se troepe Sirië sou verlaat.
mt: Last Sunday, the United States president Donald Trump announced in a statement released through the press secretary that the US troops would leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Die aankondiging is gemaak na Trump 'n telefoongesprek met die Turkse President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan gehad het.
mt: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turkye sal ook die plig oorneem om wag te hou oor gevange ISIS vegters wat, volgens die verklaring, Europese nasies wyer om te repatrieer.
mt: Turkey will also take the responsibility to guard captured ISIS fighters who, according to the statement, European nations are trying to repatriate.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Dit bevestig nie net dat daar ten minste sommige dinosaurusse was wat vere gehad het nie, wat reeds ‘n wydverspreide teorie is, maar bied ook besonderhede wat fossiele oor die algemeen nie kan nie, soos kleur en drie-dimensionele rangskikking.
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, which is already a widely held theory, but also provides details that fossils in general cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Wetenskaplike sê dat hierdie dier se vere kastaiingbruin bo-op met ‘n vaal of karetoïed-gekleurde onderkant het.
mt: Scientists say this bird's feathers are chestnut brown on top with a pale or carotene-colored underside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Die vinding gee ook insig tot die evolusie van vere in voëls.
mt: The finding also sheds light on the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Omdat die dinosourus vere nie ‘n goed-ontwikkelde skag het nie, ook genaamd as die rhachis, maar dit het ander eienskappe van vere - skagveertjies en sytakkies met baardjies - en die navorsers het afgelei dat die rhachis moontlik ‘n latere evolusionêre ontwikkeling was as hierdie ander eienskappe.
mt: Because the dinosaur's feathers lacked a well-developed rachis, but it had other features of feathers - rachis-like filaments and barbules with barbicels - the researchers inferred that the rachis may have been a later evolutionary development than these other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Die veer struktuur suggereer dat hulle nie in vlug gebruik is nie, maar eerder vir temperatuur regulasie of afwys. Die navorsers stel voor dat, selfs al is hierdie die stert van ‘n jong dinosourus, dat die monster volwasse vere wys en nie ‘n kuiken se donsies nie.
mt: The feather structure suggests they were not used in flight, but rather for temperature regulation or insulation. The researchers suggest that, even if this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen shows adult feathers and not a chick's down.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Die navorsers het voorgestel dat selfs al is dit die stert van ‘n jong dinosaurus, wys die monster volwasse vere en nie kuiken donsies nie.
mt: The researchers suggested that even if it is the tail of a young dinosaur, the monster shows adult feathers and not downy chicks.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: n Motorbom wat gisteroggend by die polisiehoofkwartiere in Gaziantep, Turkye, ontplof is het twee polisieoffisiere gedood en meer as twintig ander mense beseer.
mt: A car bomb that exploded this morning at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, killed two police officers and injured more than twenty others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Die goewerneur se kantoor het aangevoer dat negentien van die beseerdes polisieoffisiere was.
mt: 19 police officers were injured.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Die Polisie sê dat hulle ‘n beweerde Daesh (ISIL) militant verdink as verantwoordelik vir die aanval.
mt: Police say they suspect a purported Daesh (ISIL) militant of being responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Hulle het bevind dat die Son op dieselfde basiese beginsels as ander sterre werk. Dit is gevind dat die aktiwiteite van alle sterre in die sisteem gedryf word deur hul helderheid en rotasie en niks anders nie.
mt: They found that the Sun works on the same basic principles as other stars. It was found that the activities of all stars in the system are driven by their brightness and rotation and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Die helderheid en rotasie word saam gebruik om ‘n ster se Rossby nommer te bepaal, wat verwant is aan plasma vloei.
mt: The brightness and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Hoe kleiner die Rossby nommer is, hoe minder aktief is die ster met betrekking tot magnetiese ommekerings.
mt: The smaller the Rossby number is, the less active the star is with respect to magnetic eruptions.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Tydens sy reis het Iwasaki baie probleme ondervind.
mt: During his trip he encountered many problems.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Hy is deur seerowers beroof, in Tibet deur 'n hondsdol hond aangeval, die huwelik in Nepal vrygespring en is in Indië gearresteer.
mt: He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, jilted in Nepal and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Die 802.11n standaard opereer op beide die 2.4Ghz en die 5.0Ghz frekwensies.
mt: 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4GHz and the 5.0GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Dit laat dit agteruit versoenbaar wees met 802.11a, 802.11a en 802.11g, mits die basisstasie dubbele radio's het.
mt: 802.11n is backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Die snelhede van 802.11n is merkwaardig vinniger as enige van sy voorgangers, met ‘n teoretiese deurlating van 600Mbit/s
mt: 802.11n speeds are remarkably faster than any of its predecessors, with a theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, wie getroud is met twee volwasse kinders, het nie ‘n groot indruk op Miller, aan wie die storie verwant was, gelaat nie.
mt: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not make a big impression on Miller, who was related to the story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Toe hy vir kommentaar gevra is, het Miller gesê, “Mike praat baie gedurende die verhoor…Ek het gereed gemaak so ek het nie regtig gehoor wat hy gesê het nie.”
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said, “Mike talks a lot during the hearing… I was ready so I didn’t really hear what he said.”
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “Ons sal ‘n poging maak om koolstofdioksiedvrystellings per eenheid BBP te sny teen ‘n noemenswaardige marge teen 2020 vanaf die 2005 vlak,” het Hu gesê.
mt: “We will try to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,” Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Hy het nie 'n bedrag daargestel vir die inperkings nie, maar het gesê dat hulle gemaak sal word gebaseer op China se ekonomiese uitset.
mt: He did not set a figure for the restrictions, but said they would be made based on China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu het ontwikkelende lande aangemoedig om die ou pad van eers besoedel en later opruim te vermy.
mt: Hu has encouraged developing countries to avoid the old path of first pollute and then clean up.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Hy het bygevoeg, “Hulle behoort nietemin nie gevra te word om verpligtinge aan te neem wat buite hul ontwikkelingstadium, verantwoordelikheidsin en vermoëns is nie.”
mt: He added, “They should not be asked to take on responsibilities that are beyond their developmental stage, accountability and capabilities.”
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Die Irak Studie Groep het vandag, 12:00 GMT, hul verslag voorgelê.
mt: The Iraq Study Group has today, 12:00 GMT, presented its report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Dit waarsku dat niemand kan waarborg dat enige koers van aksie in Irak op hierdie punt sektariese oorlogvoering, groeiende geweld of 'n verskuiwing na chaos kan stop nie.
mt: It warns that no one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point sectarian warfare, growing violence or a shift to chaos can stop.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Die Verslag open met ‘n pleidooi vir ope debat en die formasie van ‘n konsensus in die Verenigde State oor die beleid teenoor die Midde-Ooste.
mt: The report opens with a plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States on policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Die verslag is hoogs krities oor byna elke aspek van die huidige besluit van die Uitvoerende hoof teenoor Irak en dit verg ‘n onmiddelike verandering van rigting.
mt: The report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the current decision of the Executive Director against Iraq and it requires an immediate change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Die eerste van hul 78 aanbevelings is dat ‘n nuwe diplomatieke inisiatief geneem behoort te word voor die einde van die jaar om Irak se grense teen vyandige intervensies te versterk, en om diplomatieke verhoudings te herbevestig met hul bure.
mt: The first of their 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of the year to strengthen Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions, and to reestablish diplomatic relations with their neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Huidige senator en Argentynse Presidentsvrou, Christina Fernandez de Kirchner het haar presidensiële kandidaatskap gisteraand in La Plata, ‘n stad 50 kilometer (31 myl) buite Buenos Aires, aangekondig.
mt: Current senator and Argentine First Lady, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) outside Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mev. Kirchner het haar intensie aangekondig om vir die presidensie by die Argentynse Teater aansoek te doen, dieselfde plek wat sy gebruik het om in 2005 haar veldtog vir die Senaat te begin, as lid van die Buenos Aires provinsie se afvaardiging.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for the presidency at the Argentine Theater, the same place she used in 2005 to begin her campaign for the Senate, as a member of the Buenos Aires province's delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Die debat is aangevuur deur kontroversie oor die besteding van verligtingsbefondsing en rekonstruksie in die nadraai van Orkaan Katrina; wat party fiskale konserwatiewes laggend as “Bush se New Orleans Ooreenkoms” benoem het.
mt: The debate was fueled by controversy over the spending of relief funds and reconstruction in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives derisively referred to as “Bush’s New Orleans Agreement”.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Liberale kritiek van die rekonstruksie poging fokus op die toekenning van rekonstruksie kontrakte aan waargeneemde Washington binnewerkers.
mt: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort focuses on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to observed Washington insiders.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Oor vier miljoen mense het Rome toe gegaan om die begrafnis by te woon.
mt: 4 million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Die hoeveelheid mense was so groot dat dit nie vir almal moontlik was om toegang tot die begrafnis in St. Peter’s Square te verkry nie.
mt: The number of people was so large that it was not possible for everyone to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter’s Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Verskeie groot televisie skerms is geinstalleer in verskillende plekke in Rome om mense die seremonie te laat sien.
mt: Several large television screens have been installed in various places in Rome to allow people to see the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: In baie ander stede van Italië en in die res van die wêreld, veral in Pole, was soortgelyke opstelle gemaak, wat beskou was deur ‘n groot aantal mense.
mt: In many other cities in Italy and in the rest of the world, especially in Poland, similar arrangements were made, which were seen by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Geskiedkundiges het vorige FBI beleide gekritiseer omdat dit gefokus het op gevalle wat maklik is om op te los, veral gesteelde karre, met die oog daarop om die agentskap se suksespeiling te verbeter.
mt: Historians have criticized previous FBI policies because they focused on cases that are easy to solve, especially stolen cars, with the goal of improving the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Die Kongres het die obseniteit inisiatief in fiskale 2005 begin fonds en spesifiseer dat die FBO 10 agente aan volwasse pornografie moet toewy.
mt: 2005 fiscal year, the Congress began funding the obscenity initiative and specifies that the FBO 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa hed die kolfbeurt se hoogste punte aangeteken, 70 lopies in slegs 41 balle deur 11 viere en 2 sesse te slaan.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest score of the innings, 70 runs in just 41 balls by 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Die midde orde kolwers, Sachin Tendulkar en Rahul Dravid het hulself goed gekwyt en ‘n honderdtal lopie vennootskap gevorm.
mt: The middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, have acquitted themselves well and formed a hundred-plus partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Maar, nadat die kaptein sy kolfbeurt verloor het, het Indië slegs 36 lopies gemaak en 7 paaltjies verloor na die einde van die kolfbeurt toe.
mt: But after the captain lost his wicket, India made only 36 runs and lost 7 wickets at the end of the batting innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Die V.S. president George W. Bush het in Singapoer aangeland op die oggend van November 16, wat die begin was van 'n week-lange toer van Asië.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush landed in Singapore in the morning of November 16, which was the beginning of a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Hy is begroet deur Singapoer se Adjunk Eerste Minister Wong Kan Seng en het handel en terrorisme kwessies met Singapoer se Eerste Minister Lee Hsien Loong bespreek.
mt: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Na 'n week van verliese in die mid-termyn verkiesing, het Bush 'n gehoor vertel oor die uitbreiding van handel in Asië.
mt: After a week of losses in the mid-term election, Bush gave a speech about the expansion of trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Eersteminister Stephen Harper het daarop ooreengekom om die goewernment se ‘Skoon Lug Wetsontwerp’aan alle party-komitees te stuur om dit na te sien, voor dit ‘n tweede keer gelees word, na Dinsdag se 25 minute vergadering met die NDP leier Jack Layton by die PMO.
mt: 1st Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's Clean Air Act to all party committees to review, before it is read a second time, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton het vir veranderinge aan die konserwatiewes se omgewingswet gevra tydens die byeenkoms met die EM, en gevra vir 'n "deeglike en algehele herskryf" van die Konserwatiewe party se omgewingswet.
mt: Layton asked for changes to the conservatives' environment bill at the meeting with the EM, and asked for a "thorough and complete rewrite" of the Conservative party's environment bill.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Vandat die Federale Regering ingetree het om die befondsing van die Mersey hospitaal in Devonport, Tasmania oor te neem, het die staatsregering en sommige federale MPs die aksie gekritiseer as ‘n foefie in die aanloop tot die federale verkiesing wat in November besluit word.
mt: Since the Federal Government took over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticized the move as a stunt in the lead-up to the federal election which will be decided in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Maar Eerste Minister John Howard het gesê dat die akte slegs die hospitaalfasiliteite beskerm van afgegradeer te word deur die Tasmaniese regering, en sodoende ‘n ekstra AUD$45 miljoen te gee.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the act only protects the hospital facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, and thus gives an extra AUD$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Volgens die laaste mededeling het seevlakke lesings aangewys dat ‘n tsunami ontwikkel. Daar was sommige definitiewe tsunami aktiwiteite naby Pago Pago en Niue waargeneem.
mt: According to the latest reports, sea levels readings have indicated that a tsunami has developed. There were some definite tsunami activity observed near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Geen grootskaalse skade of beserings is in Tonga aangemeld nie, maar krag was tydelik verlore, wat volgens oorlewering die Tongaanse owerhede daarvan weerhou het om die tsunami waarskuwing wat deur die PTWC uitgereik is, te ontvang.
mt: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which according to lore prevented the Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Veertien skole in Hawaii wat op of naby die kuslyne geplaas is was Woensdag vir die hele dag gesluit ten spyte van die waarskuwings wat opgehef is.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii that are located on or near the coastline were closed for the entire day Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: U.S. President George W. Bush het die aankondiging verwelkom.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bush se woordvoerder Gordon Johndroe het Noord Korea se belofte as “‘n groot stap in die rigting van ‘n verifieërbare kernontwapening van die Koreaanse skiereiland.” bestempel.
mt: Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a big step in the direction of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Die tiende genaamde storm van die Atlantiese Orkaanseisoen, Subropiese Storm Jerry, het vandag oor die Atlantiese Oseaan gevorm.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed today over the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Die National Hurricane Center (NHC) sê op hierdie stadium hou Jerry geen bedreiging in vir land nie.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says at this time Jerry poses no threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Die V.S. Liggaam van Ingenieurs het beraam dat 6 duim reën die reeds beskadigde oewerwalle kon breek.
mt: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rain could have broken the already damaged levees.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Die Negende Wyk het vloede so hoog soos 20 voet ervaar tydens Orkaan Katrina, en is huidiglik in heuphoogte water aangesien die naaste vloedwal omgegooi is.
mt: 9th Ward experienced floods as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, and is currently in chest-deep water as the nearest levee has been breached.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Water spoel oor die oewerwal in ‘n seksie 100 voet breed.
mt: 30.5 m wide.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Commons Administrateur, Adam Cuerden het sy frustrasie uitgespreek oor die weglatings, toe hy laas maand met Wikinews gepraat het.
mt: Commons Administrator, Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the omissions, when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “Hy [Wales] het basies van die begin af vir ons gelieg. Eerstens, deur voor te gee dat hierdie vir wettige redes was. Tweedens, deur voor te gee dat hy na ons luister, tot en met sy kuns vernietiging.”
mt: “He [Wales] has basically lied to us from the beginning. First, by claiming that this was for legitimate reasons. Second, by claiming that he listens to us, even to his art destruction.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Die gemeenskap se irritasie het gelei tot die huidige pogings om ‘n beleid op te stel aangaande seksuele inhoud vir webwerf wat miljoene openlik-gelisensieerde media huisves.
mt: The community’s irritation has led to the current efforts to establish a policy regarding sexual content for websites that house millions of publicly licensed media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Die werk wat gedoen word is meestal teoreties, maar die program is geskryf om observasies wat gemaak is van die Sagittarius sterrestelsel te simuleer.
mt: The work being done is mostly theoretical, but the program is written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Die effek waarna die span gesoek het, sou veroorsaak word deur getykragte tussen die melkweg se donker materie en die Melkweg se donker materie.
mt: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the Milky Way's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Net soos die maan ‘n aantrekking op die aarde uitvoer, wat die getye veroorsaak, so voer die Melkweg ook ‘n aantrekking op die Boogskutter sterrestelsel uit.
mt: Just as the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way also exert a pull on the Boötes star cluster.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Die wetenskaplikes kon tot die gevolgtrekking kom dat die donker materie ander donker materie beïnvloed op dieselfde manier as wat gewone materiaal doen.
mt: The scientists were able to conclude that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way that ordinary matter does.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Hierdie teorie sê dat die meeste donker materie om ‘n sterreselsel word gevind in ‘n tipe stralekrans, en bestaan uit baie klein deeltjies.
mt: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is found in a type of radiation belt, and consists of very small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Televisie verslae wys wit rook wat uit die fabriek kom.
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming from the factory.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Plaaslike owerhede waarsku inwoners in die omgewing van die reaktor om binne te bly, lugverkoelers af te skakel en nie kraanwater te drink nie.
mt: Local authorities warn residents in the area of the reactor to stay inside, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Volgens Japan se kernkrag agentskap, is radio-aktiewe cesium en jodium by die plantasie identifiseer.
mt: According to Japan's nuclear power agency, radioactive cesium and iodine were identified at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Owerhede spekuleer dat houers wat uraan brandstof by die perseel gehou het, dalk gebars het en besig is om te lek.
mt: Authorities speculate that fuel tanks containing uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr Tony Moll het die uiters Dwelmweerstandige Tuberkulose (XDR-TB) in die Suid-Afrikaanse streek KwaZulu-Natal ontdek.
mt: Dr Tony Moll discovered the extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: In ‘n onderhoud, het hy gesê dat die nuwe kultivar “baie hoogs onrusbarend en ontstellend was vanweê die baie hoë dodesyfer.”
mt: In an interview, he said that the new cultivar “was very alarming and shocking from the very high mortality rate.”
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Party pasiënte het dalk die kiem opgetel in die hospitaal, dink Dr. Moll, en ten minste twee was gesondheidspersoneel van die hospitaal.
mt: Some patients may have picked up the germ in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
